description:
Created by and for fishing enthusiast, the fisherman's vest has lived up to its name year after year. Designed to meet your needs when your feet are in the water, your hands on your rod and your eyes on the prize.

Made of 100% polyester mesh for breathability, it can be worn under the strong July sun, or on cooler days, by layering it nicely over a warmer mid-layer.

With plenty of storage, you'll find two cargo waist pockets, one cargo chest pocket and one zippered cargo chest pocket with an inside merrow border fly patch as well as two loose front pockets and one loose back pocket for extra storage. Pockets and shoulders are made of 100% recycled polyester canvas for reinforcement. The vest offers space and easy access to carry fly boxes, leader, nipper, aquaseal or any other gear that may be useful once you are out on the river. A rod holder and two metal D-ring at the front for tool attachment have also been added to secure your tools and have everything within easy reach.

This technical, lightweight and durable garment is a must-have in any fishing enthusiast's wardrobe, whether you're a novice or an expert.
name: Hooke Fisherman Vest - Mens
